channel.title: Daucus Carota on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Daucus Carota on funPlantGenes

item.title: DcBCH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_020269 Gene Symbol: DcBCH1 Gene Name: non-heme carotene hydroxylase Genome: carrot genome (https://www.

item.title: DcBCH2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_014519 Gene Symbol: DcBCH2 Gene Name: non-heme carotene hydroxylase Genome: Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: The relative expression level of DcBCH1 was much higher than that of DcBCH2 in carrot taproots with different carotene accumulation levels.

item.title: DcCCD4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_030904 Gene Symbol: DcCCD4 Gene Name: Carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 4 Genome: Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: DcCCD4 catalyzes the degradation of α-carotene and β-carotene to affect carotenoid accumulation and taproot color in carrot.

item.title: DcHSP17.7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DcHSP17.7 Gene Name: heat shock protein17 Genome: P27396 Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: DcHSP17.

item.title: DcMYB11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_010751 Gene Symbol: DcMYB11 Gene Name: R2R3 MYB 11 Genome: Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: Report on the discovery of DNA structural differences affecting the activity of an R2R3 MYB (encoded by DcMYB11) involved in anthocyanin regulation in carrot petiole.

item.title: DcMYB113
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_008994 Gene Symbol: DcMYB113 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 113 Genome: carrot genome (V2.

item.title: DcMYB11c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DcMYB11c Gene Name: Genome: Species: Daucus carota Functional Description: DcMYB11c could induce the expression of DcbHLH3 and anthocyanins biosynthesis genes to jointly promote anthocyanins biosynthesis.

item.title: DcMYB7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_010745 Gene Symbol: DcMYB7 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 7 Genome: DH1 (orange) carrot genome Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: Changing Carrot Color: Insertions in DcMYB7 Alter the Regulation of Anthocyanin Biosynthesis and Modification1.

item.title: DcPAR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DcPAR1 Gene Name: PHYTOCHROME RAPIDLY REGULATED1 Genome: Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: Development and carotenoid synthesis in dark-grown carrot taproots require PHYTOCHROME RAPIDLY REGULATED1 (DcPAR1).
